game.title: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess HD
game.synopsis: Link must stop Zant, the Usurper King, and save Hyrule from the encroaching Twilight Realm.
game.beginning: Link is transformed into a wolf by Zant, and he meets Midna, who helps him throughout his journey.
game.ending: Link defeats Ganondorf, banishing him to the Twilight Realm and restoring light to Hyrule.
